workExperience.title: Development Intern
workExperience.description: Currently developing a full-stack mobile application using React Native to create internal tools for the company. Focused on enhancing user experience and integrating backend services.
achievements: Developed a Ruby on Rails backend service api for internal tools
Developed a mobile application using React Native
Implamented user authentication and authorization features
Added api caching and performance optimizations
Developed extensive test suites for the application
Deployed application using Docker on Azure Cloud

workExperience.title: Flutter Developer
workExperience.description: Developed a front-end finance application using Flutter framework, integrated APIs to connect various services, and performed comprehensive debugging and testing to ensure quality assurance.
achievements: Designed the layout for the application
Created core components to be used by the entire team
Developed integration across services using REST APIs
Tested and debugged the applicaiton across multiple devices to ensure quality

workExperience.title: Security Compliance Intern
workExperience.description: Drafted security policies and protocols to ensure confidentiality, integrity and availability of information and information systems of the company.
achievements: Developed comprehensive security policies and procedures
Designed multi-layered security protocols for system protection
Created incident response frameworks for security events
Ensured compliance with data governance standards
